name: RetrieveInventoryCounts
description:
Retrieve current inventory counts for specific items and locations.

Call this tool to get current inventory counts for specified catalog objects at specific locations. Results are sorted by newest first and can be filtered by changes since a given timestamp to facilitate synchronization.

parameters.name: filter_by_catalog_object_ids
parameters.description: A list of `CatalogObject` IDs to filter the inventory results. Only applicable when set.

value_schema.description:
The filter to return results by `CatalogObject` ID.
The filter is applicable only when set.  The default is null.

parameters.name: filter_by_location_ids
parameters.description: An array of Location IDs to filter inventory counts. Only applicable when set.

value_schema.description:
The filter to return results by `Location` ID.
This filter is applicable only when set. The default is null.

parameters.name: filter_by_updated_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Filter results to include only those with a `calculated_at` timestamp after the specified RFC 3339 time. Default is the UNIX epoch.

value_schema.description:
The filter to return results with their `calculated_at` value
after the given time as specified in an RFC 3339 timestamp.
The default value is the UNIX epoch of (`1970-01-01T00:00:00Z`).

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor to retrieve the next set of results for the original query.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this to retrieve the next set of results for the original query.

See the [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/working-with-apis/pagination) guide for more information.

parameters.name: inventory_state_filters
parameters.description: Filter results by specific inventory states. Ignored states: NONE, SOLD, UNLINKED_RETURN. Provide as an array of strings.

value_schema.description:
The filter to return results by `InventoryState`. The filter is only applicable when set.
Ignored are untracked states of `NONE`, `SOLD`, and `UNLINKED_RETURN`.
The default is null.

parameters.name: record_limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of inventory count records to return.
